projects.title: ANGEL ONE PANEL - Application Development, Zoho CLIQ TRIX 2023
projects.description: Introducing our latest widget and extension for the Zoho Cliqtrix app, crafted specifically for stock market enthusiasts! Powered by Angel One SmartAPI, this addition seamlessly integrates into your existing workflow, enhancing productivity and efficiency. With our widget and extension, professionals across all industries can now effortlessly invest their time, effort, and money into the stock market directly from the Zoho Cliqtrix platform. Easily BUY, SELL, TRACK LIVE ORDERS, CANCEL ORDERS, and curate personalized WATCHLISTS of intriguing stocks from the NSE market, all within the familiar interface of Zoho Cliqtrix.
